question: South Africa has 3 capitals. Which among the following sentences is correct regarding the three capitals of South Africa?
option1: Cape Town is the legislative capital; Pretoria is the administrative capital; and Bloemfontein is the judicial capital
option2: Cape Town is the administrative capital; Pretoria is the judicial capital; and Bloemfontein is the legislative capital
option3: Cape Town is the judiciary capital; Pretoria is the administrative capital; and Bloemfontein is the legislative capital
answer: Cape Town is the legislative capital; Pretoria is the administrative capital; and Bloemfontein is the judicial capital
explanation: South Africa has 3 capitals. Cape Town, as the seat of Parliament, is the legislative capital; Pretoria, as the seat of the President and Cabinet, is the administrative capital; and Bloemfontein, as the seat of the Supreme Court of Appeal, is the judicial capital, while the Constitutional Court of South Africa sits in Johannesburg.
